events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop screen is cracked and unusable. I need assistance with this issue as soon as possible.
The reported problem has been identified as a product defect involving a damaged screen on the delivered laptop.
The case has been assigned to a product support agent specialized in hardware issues for further assistance.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the cracked laptop screen. I’m here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos showing the damage to the laptop screen and confirm the order number for verification?
Here are the photos of the cracked screen and my order number is 123456. This is really disappointing for a new product.
Thank you for the details. We will arrange a replacement laptop to be shipped to you within the next 3 days and provide a prepaid label for the return of the damaged unit.
I appreciate the quick response and replacement offer. Looking forward to receiving the new laptop soon.
The replacement process has been initiated and return instructions sent. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement laptop and that everything is working properly now.
Yes, the new laptop arrived yesterday and it is in perfect condition. Thanks again for your help.
We are glad your issue was resolved satisfactorily. Closing the case now, and feel free to reach out anytime.
